title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 826.11 - Terminal carriers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 826.11 - Terminal carriers

State Regulations

Carriers who hold certificates granted by the
commissioner which authorize only the transportation of general commodities
within a municipality or commercial zone as prescribed by the commissioner when
such transportation is under a common control, management or arrangement for a
continuous carriage or shipment by motor vehicle to or from a point without
such municipality or zone, are relieved from the requirements with respect to
concurring or participating in governing tariff publications and from posting
tariffs in which they are listed as concurring or participating terminal
carriers. Terminal carriers must, however, be listed as concurring or
participating terminal carriers in the rate tariff publications of the
line-haul carriers for whom pickup or delivery service is
effected. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
826.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
